abstract: Aide Brown Ideye (born 10 October 1988) is a Nigerian footballer who plays as a forward for Ukraine Premier League side FC Dynamo Kyiv.
comment: Aide Brown Ideye (born 10 October 1988) is a Nigerian footballer who plays as a forward for Ukraine Premier League side FC Dynamo Kyiv.
